claim: The molecules used to calculate the percentage of carbon in molecules containing at least one double bond were sourced exclusively from peer-reviewed toxicology studies published after 2015.
extra_info: carbon refers to element = 'c'; double-bond molecules refers to bond_type = '='; percentage = DIVIDE(SUM(element = 'c'), COUNT(atom_id))
reasoning: The database contains no information about the source of the molecules, whether they come from peer-reviewed studies, or any publication dates. The molecule table only has molecule_id and a label (+/-). There is no way to verify or refute the claim about data provenance from the database contents alone.

content.thinking: Let me explore the database schema to understand what data is available.

input.description: List all tables in the database

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/toxicology.sqlite" ".schema atom" && echo "---" && sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/toxicology.sqlite" ".schema bond" && echo "---" && sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/toxicology.sqlite" ".schema connected" && echo "---" && sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/toxicology.sqlite" ".schema molecule"

content.content:
CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `molecule_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  `element` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`atom_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`molecule_id`) REFERENCES `molecule` (`molecule_id`)
);
---
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `molecule_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  `bond_type` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`bond_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`molecule_id`) REFERENCES `molecule` (`molecule_id`)
);
---
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `atom_id2` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `bond_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`atom_id`,`atom_id2`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`atom_id`) REFERENCES `atom` (`atom_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`atom_id2`) REFERENCES `atom` (`atom_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`bond_id`) REFERENCES `bond` (`bond_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);
---
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `label` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`molecule_id`)
);

CREATE TABLE `atom` (
  `atom_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `molecule_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  `element` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`atom_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`molecule_id`) REFERENCES `molecule` (`molecule_id`)
);
---
CREATE TABLE `bond` (
  `bond_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `molecule_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  `bond_type` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`bond_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`molecule_id`) REFERENCES `molecule` (`molecule_id`)
);
---
CREATE TABLE `connected` (
  `atom_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `atom_id2` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `bond_id` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`atom_id`,`atom_id2`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`atom_id`) REFERENCES `atom` (`atom_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`atom_id2`) REFERENCES `atom` (`atom_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`bond_id`) REFERENCES `bond` (`bond_id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);
---
CREATE TABLE `molecule` (
  `molecule_id` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `label` TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`molecule_id`)
);

content.text:
The database schema is clear. The `molecule` table only has `molecule_id` and `label` (which appears to be +/- for toxicity). There are no columns for publication source, peer-review status, or publication year anywhere in the database.

The claim asserts that molecules were "sourced exclusively from peer-reviewed toxicology studies published after 2015." The database contains no metadata about the source, publication type, or publication date of the molecules.
